item.title: eClerx Services Ltd Gains 0.97%: 4 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Momentum
item.description: eClerx Services Ltd closed the week ending 2 January 2026 with a modest gain of 0.97%, rising from Rs.4,679.80 to Rs.4,725.00. This performance, while positive, lagged behind the Sensex’s 1.35% advance over the same period. The week was marked by a series of technical momentum shifts, a significant upgrade to a Strong Buy rating, and evolving valuation metrics that together shaped investor sentiment and price action. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Mangalore Refinery & Petrochemicals Ltd. Gains 4.45%: Mixed Technical Signals Shape Weekly Momentum
item.description: Mangalore Refinery & Petrochemicals Ltd. (MRPL) closed the week ending 2 January 2026 with a 4.45% gain, outperforming the Sensex’s 1.35% rise over the same period. The stock exhibited notable volatility, including a sharp rebound on 31 December 2025, driven by heavy trading volumes and institutional interest, despite a recent downgrade to a Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. Mixed technical signals and sectoral headwinds characterised the week’s price action, reflecting a complex market environment for MRPL. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Pankaj Polymers Gains 27.46%: 8 Key Factors Driving the Rally
item.description: Pankaj Polymers Ltd delivered a remarkable weekly performance, surging 27.46% from Rs.35.10 on 29 December 2025 to Rs.44.74 on 2 January 2026. This rally vastly outpaced the Sensex’s modest 1.35% gain over the same period, underscoring the stock’s strong momentum and resilience amid a mixed market backdrop. The week was marked by a series of new 52-week and all-time highs, sustained buying interest, and consistent outperformance relative to both the packaging sector and broader market indices. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Maithan Alloys Gains 2.55%: Valuation Shift and Mixed Technical Signals Shape the Week
item.description: Maithan Alloys Ltd delivered a modest weekly gain of 2.55%, outperforming the Sensex’s 1.35% rise over the same period. The stock showed resilience amid mixed technical signals and a notable valuation upgrade, closing the week at Rs.1,016.30 from Rs.991.00. Despite some intraday volatility and a brief dip on 1 January, the overall trend reflected cautious optimism supported by improving fundamentals and attractive price multiples. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Filatex Fashions Ltd Falls 8.57%: 5 Key Factors Behind the Volatile Week
item.description: Filatex Fashions Ltd’s stock endured a turbulent week from 29 December 2025 to 2 January 2026, closing down 8.57% at Rs.0.32 despite a strong Sensex rally of 1.35%. The stock hit multiple 52-week and all-time lows early in the week before staging a sharp rebound on 1 January, surging 14.81% to hit its upper circuit. However, the overall weekly performance reflects ongoing financial challenges and bearish momentum amid volatile trading. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: GHV Infra Projects Ltd Falls 3.44%: Technical Weakness and Valuation Concerns Weigh
item.description: GHV Infra Projects Ltd closed the week down 3.44% at Rs.287.90, underperforming the Sensex which gained 1.35% over the same period. The stock faced a mildly bearish technical shift amid mixed momentum signals and a downgrade to a Sell rating by MarketsMOJO, reflecting concerns over valuation and long-term growth despite recent positive quarterly financials. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: City Union Bank Ltd: 1.05% Weekly Decline Amidst Valuation Shift and Market Volatility
item.description: City Union Bank Ltd experienced a mixed week ending 2 Jan 2026, with its stock price declining by 1.05% from Rs.291.85 to Rs.288.80, underperforming the Sensex which rose 1.35% over the same period. The week was marked by new 52-week and all-time highs on 29 and 30 Dec 2025, followed by a gradual pullback amid valuation reassessments and subdued market conditions. Despite the weekly decline, the bank’s strong fundamentals and institutional backing remain key pillars supporting its market position. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Panama Petrochem Ltd Gains 7.59%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Volatility
item.description: Panama Petrochem Ltd closed the week with a notable 7.59% gain, outperforming the Sensex’s 1.35% rise from 29 December 2025 to 2 January 2026. The stock experienced a volatile week marked by a bearish technical shift early on, mixed momentum signals midweek, and a sharp surge on the first trading day of 2026. Despite the positive weekly return, the stock’s technical indicators and volume patterns suggest cautious optimism amid ongoing sector challenges. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Graphite India Ltd Gains 13.17%: 4 Key Drivers Behind the Rally
item.description: Graphite India Ltd delivered a strong weekly performance, gaining 13.17% from Rs.583.10 to Rs.659.90 between 29 December 2025 and 2 January 2026, significantly outperforming the Sensex’s 1.35% rise over the same period. The stock’s rally was marked by multiple new 52-week highs, heavy institutional interest, and robust technical momentum, underscoring sustained investor confidence as it closed the week near its peak levels. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Garware Hi Tech Films Ltd Gains 0.89%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Week
item.description: Garware Hi Tech Films Ltd recorded a modest weekly gain of 0.89%, closing at Rs.3,166.00 on 2 January 2026, despite underperforming the Sensex which rose 1.35% over the same period. The week was marked by a downgrade to a Sell rating amid valuation and technical concerns, a notable shift in technical momentum from mildly bullish to bearish, and mixed price movements reflecting investor caution in a challenging market environment. Time: 8 hours ago

item.title: Indraprastha Medical Corporation’s 1.07% Weekly Decline: Mixed Technical Signals and Valuation Concerns
item.description: Indraprastha Medical Corporation Ltd experienced a modest decline of 1.07% over the week ending 2 January 2026, closing at ₹453.30 from ₹458.20 the previous Friday. This underperformance contrasted with the Sensex’s 1.35% gain during the same period, reflecting mixed technical signals and valuation concerns that tempered investor enthusiasm despite the company’s strong long-term fundamentals. Time: 8 hours ago
